front.title: The Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) P-Served-User Private-Header (P-Header)

abstract.t: This document specifies the SIP P-Served-User P-header. This header field addresses an issue that was found in the 3rd-Generation Partnership Project (3GPP) IMS (IP Multimedia Subsystem) between an S-CSCF (Serving Call Session Control Function) and an AS (Application Server) on the ISC (IMS Subsystem Service Control) interface to convey the identity of the served user and the session case that applies to this particular communication session and application invocation.
